name: Cerebrawl
description:
Cerebrawl is a 2v2 4-player tag-team fighting game currently in development by a small team of six based in Seattle. We've been handling sales on our own website for about a year, but now that our prototype is out we've decided to bring the game to Itch.io!

Purchasing the prototype gets you a bunch of cool stuff and helps us keep working on this game. Any extra money we earn goes directly into making the game better - art, voices, extra polish bits and etc. Lately we've been showing the game locally, so your purchase also helps us get things like signage, equipment, covers travel costs and more.

New updates are bi-weekly!

$17+ gets you:

  • Access to current prototype updates + pre-alpha + alpha + beta + final access
  • Wallpapers
  • Discord invite
  • Mailing list access
  • The original soundtrack by 2 Mello
  • Podcast

The Soundtrack

All original soundtrack by 2 Mello!

The Prototype

The game is currently in it's prototype phase. At this time the prototype can be played with 1 or 2 players for training room practice, or 4 players for competitive play.

Check out this video to learn more about the game's core mechanics:

Upcoming features

  • Command normals
  • 7 more characters
  • Online play
  • 1v1, 2v2, and 1v2 gameplay - while the core of Cerebrawl is heavily based on 2v2 4-player gameplay, we want to experiment with all types of player configurations
  • Stage breaks - break down walls to extend stages, or bust through the floor and drop into a smaller area. Change the meta on the fly!
Learn more about us at Cerebrawl.in
